Member Library

Dive into our ever-expanding selection of e-courses based on the latest and greatest nonfiction books. We’ve prepared video series, quizzes, reading guides, and more for you to enjoy.

Online Forum

Facebook

You’re also invited to come discuss the big ideas in our members-only Facebook group. Simply request to join, and once our moderators verify your membership, you’ll be good to go!

Join on Facebook

Not on Facebook?

Discuss big ideas with your fellow members in our general discussion, located in your Member Library. No need to request to join, you’re already set to start discussing!

Local Meet-ups

The Next Big Idea Club is not just an online community. We have hundreads of local Meet-ups all year round hosted by local members.
